I have build a [twitter bot](https://twitter.com/opendata_hh) that tweets everytime a new dataset is being uploaded on the [Open Data Portal of Hamburg](http://transparenz.hamburg.de/suche/). You can find the code behind the bot on [my Github](https://github.com/kruse-alex/twitter_bot_opendata_hh). It is sheduled via a cronjob on a virtual machine on Google Cloud Platform.
